group.name: Plugin Commands: Update TC Link Key
group.description: The update trust center link key commands are used to manipulate the behavior of the joining device to attempt the trust center link key updates in a certain fashion.

command.description: This sets the the amount of time between subsequent trust center link key updates in milliseconds.

arg.name: timeInMilliseconds
arg.description: The amount of time between subsequent trust center link key updates in milliseconds
